label.phrase: los angeles reuters comedian jerry lewis was detained by police in las vegas late last week when airport screeners found an unloaded gun in his baggage authorities said on tuesday

clusterList.phrase: los angeles reuters comedian jerry lewis was detained by police in las vegas late last week when airport screeners found an unloaded gun in his baggage authorities said on tuesday

lewis 82 had a small 22-caliber handgun when he arrived at the security screening area on friday at las vegas mccarran international airport said officer ramon denby a spokesman for the las vegas metropolitan police department
the comedian was briefly detained and the gun was seized lewis was cited for carrying a concealed weapon without a permit denby said
